snippet: The United Nations expressed alarm over the recent heavy fighting that had displaced more than 100,000 people and blocked aid deliveries to 650,000.
abstract: United Nations alerts heavy fighting in South Sudan has displaced more than 100,000 people and blocked aid deliveries to 650,000.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations expressed alarm over the recent heavy fighting that had displaced more than 100,000 people and blocked aid deliveries to 650,000.
